name: The Infamous Roll of the Dice
name_original: The Infamous Roll of the Dice
description:
Made for GMTK Game Jam 2022.

You have it! The Infamous Roll of the Dice! You must hold onto it at all costs, and deliver it home where we may keep it safe. Beware, other Die will try to take it from you; if they do, fight for it back!

Use your mouse cursor to aim.

InputActionWMove Player UpAMove Player LeftSMove Player DownDMove Player RightLMBShootRRestart Level

This is not only my first ever game jam, but also my first original game. The experience has been great so far and I think it's amazing that all of this can fit into a 48 hour window! Of course this game is not in any sort of finished state, but I am happy with what i've done. I look forward to seeing everyone else's games :)
